event.title: Women of the future prefer to have sex with robots?
event.description:
The book “Love and Sex with Robots”, published by British artificial intelligence expert David Levy in 2007, predicts that by 2050, humans will have a close relationship with robots. It’s just sex, love, friendship and marriage. Ian Pearson, a futurist who boasted a prediction accuracy rate of 85%, went further, predicting that by 2050, humans and sex doll will have more love than humans. The sex toy industry has an annual output value of 15 billion yuan, and with the rise of high-tech products such as virtual reality porn and remote sex, the industry’s prospects are even more promising. Pearson believes that by 2025, women will prefer to have sex with love doll rather than men. Harvard professor Cathy O’Neil even thinks that real men will gradually be eliminated. She said that in the future, robots can help with cleaning, washing dishes, doing housework, and provide love and sex. Therefore, women in the future are likely to prefer to stay with robots rather than real men.
